bSkipExcludedDirectories: If true, will not validate files in excluded directories
bShowIfNoFailures: If true, will add notifications for files with no validation and display even if everything passes
bCollectPerAssetDetails: If true, will add an FValidateAssetsDetails for each asset to the results
bLoadAssetsForValidation: If false, unloaded assets will get skipped from validation.
bCaptureAssetLoadLogs: If true, captures log warnings and errors from loading assets for validation and reports them as validation results
bCaptureLogsDuringValidation: If true, captures log warnings and errors from other operations that happen during validation and adds them to validation results
MaxAssetsToValidate: Maximum number of assets to attempt to validate
bValidateReferencersOfDeletedAssets: Should we validate referencers of deleted assets in changelists
